Package com.hexaware.controller

Class AuthenticationService

java.lang.Object
com.hexaware.controller.AuthenticationService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAuthenticationService
public class AuthenticationService extends Object implements IAuthenticationService
This class implements the IAuthenticationService interface and provides methods for authenticating customers and admins.

  • Method Details

    • isCustomerExists

      public boolean isCustomerExists(String username, String password) throws AuthenticationException
      Checks if a customer exists in the system based on the provided username and password.
      Specified by:
      isCustomerExists in interface IAuthenticationService
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the customer.
      password - The password of the customer.
      Returns:
      True if the customer exists and the password matches, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      AuthenticationException - If authentication fails due to incorrect username or password.

    • isAdminExists

      public boolean isAdminExists(String username, String password) throws AuthenticationException
      Checks if an admin exists in the system based on the provided username and password.
      Specified by:
      isAdminExists in interface IAuthenticationService
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the admin.
      password - The password of the admin.
      Returns:
      True if the admin exists and the password matches, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      AuthenticationException - If authentication fails due to incorrect username or password.
